Name: expanded clay production | expanded clay | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2399:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products n.e.c.
Description: The mined clay is mixed with water, ground, sometimes granulated and burned at reverse flow in a rotary furnace at 1’200 °C. The included organic materials burn and the clay pellets expand with the help of heavy fuel oil. The surface melts and produces a sintered shell.
